definitions.definition: A word that names an object from a single characteristic of it or of a closely related object; a word used in metonymy .
examples: Calling a government a " city hall " is using a metonym .

definitions.definition: A concept , idea , or word used to represent, typify , or stand in for a broader set of ideas.

main_definition: ( grammar ) A word that names an object from a single characteristic of it or of a closely related object; a word used in metonymy .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A concept , idea , or word used to represent, typify , or stand in for a broader set of ideas.
